mapper.sql: SELECT P.PRO_NO, P.PRO_SEL_NO, P.PRO_NAME, P.PRO_BRAND, P.PRO_CATEGORY1, P.PRO_CATEGORY2, P.PRO_TAG, P.PRO_IMG, P.PRO_QTY, P.PRO_OPRICE, P.PRO_SPRICE, P.PRO_DEL_FEE, P.PRO_LTIME, P.PRO_CONTENT, P.PRO_RDATE, P.PRO_STATUS, P.PRO_REP_COUNT FROM PRODUCT P JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.PRO_SEL_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE P.PRO_STATUS = 'Y' AND (PRO_NAME || PRO_TAG LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%') AND PRO_CATEGORY1 LIKE '%' || #{proCategory1} || '%' AND PRO_CATEGORY2 LIKE '%' || #{proCategory2} || '%'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_STATUS='Y'

SELECT P.PRO_NO, P.PRO_SEL_NO, P.PRO_NAME, P.PRO_BRAND, P.PRO_CATEGORY1, P.PRO_CATEGORY2, P.PRO_TAG, P.PRO_IMG, P.PRO_QTY, P.PRO_OPRICE, P.PRO_SPRICE, P.PRO_DEL_FEE, P.PRO_LTIME, P.PRO_CONTENT, P.PRO_RDATE, P.PRO_STATUS, P.PRO_REP_COUNT FROM PRODUCT P JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.PRO_SEL_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE P.PRO_STATUS = 'Y' AND (PRO_NAME || PRO_TAG LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%') ORDER BY P.PRO_NO DESC

SELECT P.PRO_NO, P.PRO_SEL_NO, P.PRO_NAME, P.PRO_BRAND, P.PRO_CATEGORY1, P.PRO_CATEGORY2, P.PRO_TAG, P.PRO_IMG, P.PRO_QTY, P.PRO_OPRICE, P.PRO_SPRICE, P.PRO_DEL_FEE, P.PRO_LTIME, P.PRO_CONTENT, P.PRO_RDATE, P.PRO_STATUS, P.PRO_REP_COUNT FROM PRODUCT P JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.PRO_SEL_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE P.PRO_STATUS = 'Y' AND P.PRO_NO = #{proNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( PRO_NO, PRO_SEL_NO, PRO_NAME, PRO_BRAND, PRO_CATEGORY1, PRO_CATEGORY2, PRO_TAG, PRO_IMG, PRO_QTY, PRO_OPRICE, PRO_SPRICE, PRO_DEL_FEE, PRO_LTIME, PRO_CONTENT, PRO_RDATE, PRO_STATUS, PRO_REP_COUNT ) VALUES ( SEQ_PRO_NO.NEXTVAL, #{proSelNo}, #{proName}, #{proBrand}, #{proCategory1}, #{proCategory2}, #{proTag}, #{renamedFileName}, #{proQty}, #{proOPrice}, #{proSPrice}, #{proDelFee}, #{proLTime}, #{proContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )

UPDATE PRODUCT
PRO_NAME = #{ proName },
PRO_BRAND = #{ proBrand },
PRO_CATEGORY1 = #{ proCategory1 },
PRO_CATEGORY2 = #{ proCategory2 },
PRO_TAG = #{ proTag },
PRO_IMG = #{ renamedFileName },
PRO_QTY = #{ proQty },
PRO_OPRICE = #{ proOPrice },
PRO_SPRICE = #{ proSPrice },
PRO_DEL_FEE = #{ proDelFee },
PRO_LTIME = #{ proLTime },
PRO_CONTENT = #{ proContent }
WHERE PRO_NO = #{ proNo }
UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRO_STATUS = #{ proStatus } WHERE PRO_NO = #{ proNo }
INSERT INTO CART ( CART_NO, CART_MEM_NO, PRO_NO, PRO_COUNT ) VALUES ( SEQ_PRO_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ no }, #{ proNo }, #{ proCount } )
DELETE FROM CART WHERE CART_NO = #{ cartNo }
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET PRO_COUNT = #{ proCount } WHERE CART_NO = #{ cartNo }
mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_NO, C.CART_MEM_NO, C.PRO_NO, C.PRO_COUNT, P.PRO_NAME, P.PRO_BRAND, P.PRO_IMG, P.PRO_OPRICE, P.PRO_SPRICE, P.PRO_DEL_FEE, P.PRO_LTIME FROM CART C LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON(C.PRO_NO = P.PRO_NO) WHERE C.CART_MEM_NO = #{ no }
SELECT CART_NO, CART_MEM_NO, PRO_NO, PRO_COUNT FROM CART WHERE CART_MEM_NO = #{ no } AND PRO_NO = #{ proNo }
